# coMethTF

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->


`coMethTF` can be used to generate testable hypothesis on the synergistic interaction of DMRs and TFs in gene regulation. 
`coMethTF` can be used either to evaluate regulatory potentials of candidate regions or to search for methylation coupled TF regulatory processes in the entire genome.

## Installation

You can install the released version of coMethTF from GitHub with:

``` r
devtools::install_github("TransBioInfoLab/coMethTF")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(coMethTF)
## basic example code
```
